article_title: Sen. Shelby to Unveil Legislation Heightening Fed Scrutiny
article_text:
WASHINGTON—Senate Banking Chairman Richard Shelby plans to unveil on Tuesday a wide-ranging bill that would heighten congressional scrutiny of the Federal Reserve and revamp numerous rules faced by small- and medium-size banks, according to Republican committee aides.

The draft legislation, which Republicans described as a starting point for further negotiations, represents the most ambitious attempt to revamp the financial...
